definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Paggy tell Paul, hot and sour soup is very delicious.
sentences.chinese: 佩琪告诉保罗，酸辣汤非常的好喝。

sentences.english: The tastiest hot tea, does not sweeten.
Good coffee, really hit the spot.
People always bring it food and drinks and comb its hair.
sentences.chinese: 人们给它好吃的好喝的，给他梳理鬃毛。

sentences.english: You'd better drink some weak tea.
What sounds good to drink with your cookie?
sentences.chinese: 吃饼干时配何种饮料好喝？

sentences.english: Mary Ann, that's who makes the best soup.
sentences.chinese: 马利安，她就是那个汤做得最好喝的人。

sentences.english: My favorite drink is a glass of red wine or a good sangria.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的饮料是红酒或好喝的桑格利亚水果酒。

sentences.english: But unfortunately he had his failings too: laziness and a love of tippling .
sentences.chinese: 可惜他又有一样坏脾气，便是好喝懒做。

sentences.english: I think that's nice and fruity, but beer generally.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得好喝又有水果味，但一般还是啤酒。

sentences.english: Natalia also drink a whitening beauty cream soup.
sentences.chinese: 还好喝了娜塔美白汤祛斑。

sentences.english: Wife greedy miser wine, usually drink Liang Zhong.
sentences.chinese: 吝啬鬼妻子馋酒，平常好喝两盅。

sentences.english: She said it was delicious and kept asking me how it was made.
sentences.chinese: 直呼好喝，不断问我珍珠奶茶的制作过程。

sentences.english: I think low-fat milk tastes better than whole milk.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得低脂牛奶比全脂的好喝。

sentences.english: How do I feel about the oats?
Is the hatred that makes that bottle of beer taste extra ordinary nice.
sentences.chinese: 是恨吧，把那瓶平常觉得好难喝的酒变得无比的好喝。

definition: to be fond of eating/to be gluttonous
Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
